question: I'm desperate for help- Anyone out there please help. My husband moved here from England three years ago, and since then has been very ill. Every day he wakes up with Naseau, fatigue and loss of apetite. He has lost over 37 lbs in a month, the first month he arrived. He goes up and down in weight, and continues to throw up almost every morning. They have run numerous tests and cannot find anything. He is a type 1 diabetic and we still cannot figure out what is wrong with him.  Recently the Dr prescriped him anti-depresseants, so he could sleep better. He has to force himself to eat most times. Please help ! Does anyone have any suggestions, or know what this could be? We are at a loss.
title: Daily Nausea, Fatigue, Loss of Apetite and weight loss?
